model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I'm pretty excited! They just added one of my favorite dishes to the menu at work. I can't wait for my next shift so I can try it for free. I will send you a pic later, ok? 
Okay, yes, please send me a pic as soon as you can. I can't wait to see it. What is the name of the dish?
It's a Chicken parmesan, with a red pepper marinara. It's so crisp and juicy-I love it! They serve it with these sweet roasted asparagus!
Oh that sounds absolutely fabulous. Are you going to get a free dessert, as well?
Yes, I am thinking about trying either the new eclairs, or their tres leches cake with fresh raspberry jam sauce and lemon drizzle! I have too many good options to pick from! What one would you pick?
Hands down, I would pick the tres leches. Ever since I tried it a few years ago, it has always been my favorite dessert.
Okay, I will try that! I've heard the can be made with different fruits. Did you have fruit with yours?
I like it best with fresh strawberries. And then it is even better with some fresh whipped cream and chocolate drizzle. Just thinking about it is making me want to have some right now!

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Restaurant Perks and Schedule', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A describes restaurant perks, including free meals, and work schedule.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker B: Haha… I can see it coming! They won’t have to twist my arm… I feel so blessed to be able to spend so much time with them! But ya if it’s too crazy I’ll just shut my eyes and teleport myself to the Aerosmith concert in the glory days lol ### Speaker A: I can't think of two acts more different.  The only similarity will be the screaming girls in the audience.lol ### Speaker B: Hehe… true! By the way do you get to eat for free at the restaurant you work at? ### Speaker A: We get two free meals per week and we can take home any left over baked goods at the end of the night so they don't go to waste.  It's a nice perk for sure. ### Speaker B: Wow… that’s awesome! I’ve always thought that’s a gr8 perk myself! ### Speaker A: Yeah, it's better than just a discount cause I shouldn't eat out too much since it's expensive and it saves me a little money on meals.  The food is good too. ### Speaker B: That is really nice! What’s your schedule like? Do you work on weekends also? ### Speaker A: Unfortunately.  I usually work a double on Saturday and I work Monday, Tuesday, and Thursday 8 hours each roughly.  It all depends on how busy we get.' }
```
